Couldn't shake this thought about simple content management in @trello from @markconroy, so I had a little play! Opted for labels instead of columns for stage/prod content, so that it can appear in the right place. Needs polish, but it's simple and fun! https://t.co/S0UJR1CqsP https://t.co/yG65m2C7a3 https://t.co/LnfnT0Cpc9
